summary: Tatya Vinchu comes back to life after 20 years, and now wants to migrate into the body of Lakshya's son.
cast: Makarand Anaspure|Ramdas Padhye|Laxmikant Berde|Abhijeet Chavan|Vijay Chavan|Ameya Hunaswadkar|Jitendra Joshi|Raghavendra Kadkol|Madhu Kambikar|Addinath Kothare|Mahesh Kothare|Sonalee Kulkarni|Vijay Patwardhan|Siddhesh Prabhakar|Dilip Prabhavalkar|Deepak Shirke|Vishakha Subhedar|Sai Tamhankar|Sunil Tawde|Umesh Tope|Tatya Vinchu
title: Zapatlela 2
